feed.title: Provisions (was: PSA: Taproot loss of quantum protections)

entry.title: Provisions (was: PSA: Taproot loss of quantum protections)
entry.summary: In this message, ZmnSCPxj responds to Andrew and Andrea, providing them with additional information regarding Taproot. Specifically, Andrea had asked about Taproot ring signatures, and ZmnSCPxj shares a link to the Bitcoin Wiki page on Taproot uses. Additionally, ZmnSCPxj includes a link to a GitHub page on Taproot ring signatures, although they admit to not having read it themselves.Overall, ZmnSCPxj's message is brief and to the point, simply providing the requested links without further explanation or elaboration. However, the inclusion of these resources may be helpful for Andrew and Andrea in their research or understanding of Taproot and its various applications.
